page.title: 04Fashion in 1985.Accessories
page.content: Fashion is not only clothes it includes shoes,make up,scarves,gloves and jewellery.These are called accessories.Good shoes are made from leather.Ladies wear slip ons,this means the shoes have no straps or laces.Make up is applied to the face. Lipstick is put on the lips and eye shadow is put on the eye lids and both come in a wide varity of shades. Blusher is a fine powder put on the cheek bones.Mascara (which is mostly black) is put on the eyelashes. Foundation is put on all over the face,this is a base for all the other make up.Powder is appliied to the nose to stop the nose shining.Hair is a form of decoration.Girls can wear their hair long or short but men wear their hair short usually.
